token_info.description: A tiny interactive narrative made up of vignettes recorded on my last flight from Australia to the UK before Covid hit. Australia‚Äôs borders have been shut since March 2020. ‚Ä¢ Stayed awake the entire flight. Music, podcasts, and the inflight display on downward camera. Over ocean, desert, farmland, cities, it was a strange kind of bliss. ‚Ä¢ Flight time is over 800x shorter (~21 hours now only a couple of minutes).
